name: CVCFT.com
tagline: The source for the /r/Civcraft webmap that was hosted at CVCFT.com
body:
### Welcome to CVCFT.com
This website used to host a webmap for the [/r/Civcraft](https://reddit.com/r/Civcraft) minecraft server. It is now closed down due to my lack of wanting to manage it. You can download the source and run your own copy of the map [by clicking here](https://github.com/PieCrafted/CVCFT). Everything is in the README.md file.

### Authors and Contributors
This project is based off of the civmap-client by @gipsy-king. You can view the original repo [here](https://github.com/gipsy-king/civmap-client).

### Contact
You can shoot me an email at [webmaster@cvcft.com](mailto:webmaster@cvcft.com].
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
